about_the_game:
In this stunning 2D action-adventure game, lovingly hand-drawn in the captivating Japanese style of Ukiyo-e painting, you can explore the depths of Kaida's world, unraveling the mysteries behind the pollution that threatens her pond and all the surrounding life. Together, you will help Kaida find her inner strength and learn to appreciate the beauty that lies beneath the surface.

Get ready for an old-school 2D brawler-style side-scroller experience like no other! You will navigate treacherous environments, battle crazed wildlife, solve puzzles, and uncover the sinister force that's terrorizing the river. With roots in Japanese lore, Koitusgi: Legend of The Water Guardian promises an unforgettable adventure as we fight to restore balance to the land and protect Kaida's home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10/11
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB of video memory, 16-bit or 32-bit color quality
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: n/a

short_description: Play as Kaida, a koi who is reluctantly thrown in to save, not just her pond, but the entire river from a poison that turns the habitants into raged filled monsters. In this story driven action-adventure you will slug it out with some of these river dwellers, friend and foe, to save your home!
